main_characters.name: Father Ted Crilly
main_characters.quote: That would be an ecumenical matter!

main_characters.name: Father Dougal McGuire
main_characters.quote: Sorry, Ted. I was concentrating too hard on looking holy.

main_characters.name: Mrs. Doyle
main_characters.quote: Go on, go on, go on, go on, go on, go on, go on, go on, go on!

description: The show revolves around three dysfunctional Irish priests and their housekeeper, who live on Craggy Island.
